div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1059 Olbia (mod. Parutino), 1957 Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. Contents: 43 A. Under layer of ashes and earth, at approximately the same level Olbia: 2 aes grave (as Burachkov, pl. 1, 6) 36 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 4 [2], 8 [7], 11 [3], 13 [7], 16 [1], 20 [3], 22 [8], 23 [4]; pl. 10, 1 [1]) Unc.: 5 AE Disposition: Leningrad (Institute) Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
